title: Conan the Librarian
description: Never before in the history of motion pictures has there been a screen presence so commanding so powerful, so deadly. He’s Conan the Librarian!
quote: Don’t you know… THE DEWEY DECIMAL SYSTEM?
altHero: Concan the Barbarian in a library
alt1: Conan lifts up and scowls at a frightened library patron
alt2: Conan poses with his sword in front of a “Return books here” sign
alt3: Conan yells with his sword raised above his head
alt4: Conan slices a boy in half
